#summary This page presents tutorials on the usage of SIMILE Timeline and Google Maps.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

This page illustrates the use of the Google Maps and SIMILE Timeline Javascript APIs

= Google Maps =

One [http://code.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=65620&topic=11364 tutorial from Google] describes how to build a [http://code.google.com/articles/support/ezdigitizer.htm simple digitizer] that allows users to point and click over the map, geocode street addresses, or draw around a particular region and store the geographical coordinates in KML. Another [http://code.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=87134&topic=11364&ctx=sibling tutorial] shows how to create a simple store locator with PHP, MySQL & Google Maps.

http://g.codesite.articles.googlepages.com/cschalk-ezdigitizer.jpg

= SIMILE Timeline =

The [http://simile.mit.edu/timeline/docs/create-timelines.html tutorial at the project's website] shows how to create simple Timelines.

http://www.vwtimeline.org/images/simile-timeline-example.jpg
